original_title: Harry Knuckles and the Treasure of the Aztec Mummy
overview: Harry Knuckles (code name Spanish Fly) must stop his nemesis who has kidnapped his daughter and poisoned her. Harry and his partner, Santo must find the serum that can save her and stop the ancient Aztec Mummy and it's evil zombies that pursue.
title: Harry Knuckles and the Treasure of the Aztec Mummy
